questions.question: What version of the application has this bug?
questions.description: Version number where bug occurs

questions.question: In which environment did you find this bug?
questions.description: Environment where bug was discovered

questions.question: On which platform does this bug occur?
questions.description: Primary platform affected

questions.question: Which browser or device showed this bug?
questions.description: Specific browser version or device model

questions.question: What operating system were you using?
questions.description: OS where bug was observed

questions.question: Any additional environment details?
questions.description: Extra context that might affect reproduction

questions.question: List the exact steps to reproduce this bug
questions.description: Numbered list of actions that consistently trigger the bug
questions.placeholder:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter valid username
3. Enter valid password
4. Click Login button

questions.question: What should happen according to the requirements?
questions.description: Describe the correct behavior expected
questions.placeholder: User should be redirected to the dashboard and see a welcome message

questions.question: What actually happens when the bug occurs?
questions.description: Describe the incorrect behavior observed
questions.placeholder: User remains on login page and sees error 'Invalid credentials' despite entering correct details

questions.question: Add links to screenshots, videos, or logs that show the bug
questions.description: Upload evidence files and paste their links here

questions.question: How severe is this bug?
questions.description: Impact on system usability (Critical = system down, Low = cosmetic)

questions.question: What should be the fix priority?
questions.description: Order in which this bug should be fixed

questions.question: What is the Bug ID?
questions.description: Unique identifier for tracking this bug

questions.question: Which feature or module is affected?
questions.description: Name of the feature where the bug occurs

questions.question: Provide a short, descriptive title for this bug
questions.description: Clear summary of the issue
questions.placeholder: Login button remains disabled after entering credentials

questions.question: Who reported this bug?
questions.description: Name of person who discovered the bug

questions.question: When was this bug reported?
questions.description: Date when the bug was first identified

questions.question: What is the current status of this bug?
questions.description: Current state in the bug lifecycle

questions.question: Related Test Case ID (if any)
questions.description: ID of test case that uncovered this bug

questions.question: Related Requirement or User Story ID
questions.description: Link to requirement that is not working

questions.question: How often does this bug occur?
questions.description: Rate of bug occurrence

questions.question: Is there a workaround available?
questions.description: Whether users can avoid this bug
